Testing FYL2X instruction
FYL2X computes y * log2(x)

Test case 1:
x: 2.00000000000000000000 (0x40008000000000000000)
y: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Expected: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0020
Tag Word:     0x0020
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: PE 
PASS

PASS
